mean_cn: adj. 有特色的，与众不同的
mean_en: having a quality or characteristic that makes a person or thing different from others :different in a way that is easy to notice
word_etyma: distinct明显的+ive...的 → 有区别的
short_phrase: the distinctive color of a rose
sentence: The distinctive color of the red rose made it stand out in the photo.
sentence_trans: 与众不同的颜色让这朵红玫瑰在照片中变得突出。
